column5: I was up at my sister's cottage this weekend and planned on fishing live leeches for smallies wacky style    Bought a dozen of them and thought I'd share how I rig them    Well, fishing wise was tough   since the reservoir / lake, had 4' of water missing in it    Most of the structure that used to be under water, was above it    Oh well     was still fun trying  Made this little video to show you's... enjoy!!! TJunkie  <embed width="600" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowFullscreen="true" allowNetworking="all" wmode="transparent" src="http://static.photobucket.com/player.swf" flashvars="file=http%3A%2F%2Fvid732.photobucket.com%2Falbums%2Fww321%2Fleechman1%2FSoftwater%2520Season%25202012%2FCamp%2520Danielle%2520et%2520Phil%2520-%252028%2520Juillet%25202012%2FRiggingLiveLeechesWackyStyle.mp4">
I think it just may    but will see... I'm still a fish junkie
